name: Filament Team Guard
description: Enhanced Laravel starter kit built with Filament. Team management, auth, registration, 2FA, passkeys, Cloudflare Turnstile, session management, API tokens. Inspired by Laravel Jetstream.

author.name: Momin Al Zaraa
author.bio: Full-stack developer and Laravel enthusiast specializing in building scalable web applications and developer tools.

features: Auth: login, register, password reset, email verification
Profile: photo, info, password, sessions, delete account
2FA and passkeys (TOTP, recovery codes, Spatie Laravel Passkeys)
Optional Cloudflare Turnstile on auth and 2FA pages
Teams: create, invite, roles, member management
Publishable Action classes and contracts (Jetstream pattern)
Publishable language files with locale-first merge
